TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ListViewItem/ListViewSubItem extends System.Object

span.span: Represents a subitem of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控制項會顯示一份所定義的項目類別。A control displays a list of items that are defined by the class. 每個可以儲存所定義的子項目物件類別。Each can store subitem objects that are defined by the class. 子項目會顯示當的屬性控制設為 。Subitems are displayed when the property of the control is set to . 一般而言，子項目包含至其父項目相關的資訊。Typically, subitems contain information that is related to their parent item. 例如，如果控制項會顯示代表訂單項目，每個項目可以顯示的順序號碼。For example, if a control displays items that represent orders, each item could display the order number. 無法加入子項目，每個項目來顯示資訊，例如訂購的產品、 ordered、 項目數量和的已排序的項目總價。Subitems could be added to each item to display information such as the product ordered, the quantity of items ordered, and the total price of the items ordered. 不同於物件無法由使用者直接編輯的物件 (使用者可以編輯物件如果屬性控制設為 `true`)。Unlike objects, objects cannot be edited directly by the user (the user can edit objects if the property of the control is set to `true`). 子項目不能直接編輯使用者，且不會顯示映像，因為內容會限於影響子項目文字的樣式，當它出現在控制項。Because subitems cannot be directly edited by the user and do not display images, properties are limited to those that affect the style of the subitem text when it is displayed in the control. 如果的屬性，其中包含的子項目設定為`false`，您可以使用， ，和屬性，以變更要顯示的文字所套用的樣式。If the property of the that contains the subitems is set to `false`, you can use the , , and properties to change the styles applied to the text display. 一般而言，項目和子項目的樣式中是相同控制項，但如果您想要變更的特定樣式以反白顯示，您可以使用這些屬性，在您想要以不同方式顯示的項目。Typically, the styles of the item and the subitems are the same in a control, but if you want to change the style of a specific to highlight it, you can use these properties on the items you want to display differently. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立有三個控制項指定的物件和三個每個項目所指定的物件。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此範例也會建立物件詳細資料檢視中顯示的子項目。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 兩個物件也會建立在程式碼範例中提供的映像物件。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 這些物件加入至和屬性。These objects are added to the and properties. 此範例會使用下列屬性建立控制項。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 您要新增的程式碼並呼叫建構函式或在表單上的另一種方法從範例中所建立的方法。You need to add the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 這個範例需要映像名為`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位於 c 磁碟機的根目錄The example requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. [!code-cpp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定子項目文字的背景色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the subitem's text.

value.span: ，表示子項目文字的背景色彩。

span.span: A that represents the background color of the subitem's text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性來變更顯示子項目文字的背景色彩。You can use the property to change the color displayed behind the subitem text. 如果您想要使用不同的背景和前景色彩組合，就可以使用這個屬性 (使用屬性來設定前景色彩) 從另一個區隔一個子項目。This property can be used if you want to use different background and foreground color combinations (using the property to set the foreground color) to differentiate one subitem from another. 例如，您可以設定屬性設來識別顯示負數值的子項目。For example, you could set the property to to identify subitems that display a negative value. 如果的屬性擁有子項目設定為`true`，設定這個屬性沒有任何作用。If the property of the that owns the subitem is set to `true`, setting this property has no effect.

The bounding of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果尚未加入至或擁有尚未加入至，則屬性會傳回空白。If the has not been added to a or the owning has not been added to a , the property returns an empty .

summary.span: 取得或設定子項目所顯示的文字字型。

span.span: Gets or sets the font of the text displayed by the subitem.

value.span: 要套用至控制項顯示之文字的 。

span.span: The to apply to the text displayed by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來變更套用至子項目的文字的字型樣式。You can use this property to change the font styles applied to the text of the subitem. 如果的屬性設定為`true`，變更此屬性會有任何作用。If the property of the is set to `true`, changing this property will have no effect. 因為不可變 （表示您無法調整其任一屬性），您只能指派新的屬性。Because the is immutable (meaning that you cannot adjust any of its properties), you can only assign the property a new . 不過，您可以根據現有的字型為新字型。However, you can base the new font on the existing font. 如何調整現有的字型，讓它變成粗體的範例如下：The following is an example of how to adjust the existing font to make it bold: ```csharp listViewItem1.SubItems[1].Font = new Font(listViewItem1.SubItems[1].Font, listViewItem1.SubItems[1].Font.Style | FontStyle.Bold); ``` ```vb ListViewItem1.SubItems[1].Font = New Font(ListViewItem1.SubItems[1].Font, _ ListViewItem1.SubItems[1].Font.Style Or FontStyle.Bold) ``` 如果的屬性擁有子項目設定為`true`，設定這個屬性沒有任何作用。If the property of the that owns the subitem is set to `true`, setting this property has no effect. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性，以`false`定義的自訂樣式物件。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to `false` to define a custom style for objects. 此範例示範如何設定和屬性。The example demonstrates how to set the and properties. 若要執行此範例，請將下列程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`InitializeListView`表單的建構函式中的方法或事件處理方法。To run the example, paste the following code into a form, and call the `InitializeListView` method in form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/VB/form1.vb#1)]

value.span: ，表示子項目文字的前景色彩。

span.span: A that represents the foreground color of the subitem's text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性來變更子項目文字的色彩。You can use the property to change the color of the subitem text. 如果您想要使用不同的背景和前景色彩組合，就可以使用這個屬性 (使用屬性來設定背景色彩) 從另一個區隔一個項目。This property can be used if you want to use different background and foreground color combinations (using the property to set the background color) to differentiate one item from another. 例如，您可以設定屬性設識別具有負數與其相關聯的項目。For example, you could set the property to to identify items that have a negative number associated with them. 如果的屬性擁有子項目設定為`true`，設定這個屬性沒有任何作用。If the property of the that owns the subitem is set to `true`, setting this property has no effect. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性，以`false`定義的自訂樣式物件。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to `false` to define a custom style for objects. 此範例示範如何設定和屬性。The example demonstrates how to set the and properties. 若要執行此範例，請將下列程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`InitializeListView`表單的建構函式中的方法或事件處理方法。To run the example, paste the following code into a form, and call the `InitializeListView` method in form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 將套用至子項目的樣式重設為預設的字型和色彩。

span.span: Resets the styles applied to the subitem to the default font and colors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法來重設字型、 背景色彩和套用至子項目的前景色彩的設定。You can use this method to reset the font, background color, and foreground color settings applied to the subitem. 樣式會重設，子項目會顯示使用預設字型、 背景色彩和前景色彩的設定。When the styles are reset, the subitem is displayed using the default font, background color, and foreground color settings. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何重設的子項目的樣式利用屬性和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to reset the style of the subitems of a through the use of the property and the method. 若要執行此範例，請將下列程式碼貼到包含名為按鈕的表單`Button1`，並呼叫`InitializeListView`表單的建構函式中的方法或事件處理方法。To run the example, paste the following code into a form containing a button named `Button1`, and call the `InitializeListView` method in the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/VB/form1.vb#2)]
